name: old-charm
effect: Given to Cynthia's grandmother to get the Surf HM.
short_effect: Trade to Cynthia's grandmother in Celestic Town for HM04 (Surf).

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
An ancient good-luck charm made of
Pokémon bones to be taken to the elder
of Celestic Town.
